item.title: Allister: the impact of the EU Withdrawal Act
item.description:
Anurag Deb, a PhD researcher at Queen’s University, explores the legal implications of Brexit on Northern Ireland, particularly focusing on the impact of the EU Withdrawal Act 2018 and the subsequent amendments made by the EU Withdrawal Agreement Act 2020. He argues that the 2020 Act didn’t simply maintain the legal status quo as one might expect, but instead partially reversed the intended purpose of the 2018 Act. This reversal is most evident in Section 7A of the 2018 Act, which incorporates the EU Withdrawal Agreement (including the Northern Ireland Protocol) into UK law...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/allister-the-impact-of-the-eu-withdrawal-act/
